content: Always great to see @confwall inception happening ‚ù§
I must say, @confwall was lovely at last week's Bad Voltage Live show. If you want a twitter wall for your conference, I recommend it.
This wall is powered by @confwall. If you run your own event, get a confwall today at confwall.com
